meaningMnemonic: An <radical>insect</radical> specializing in <radical>construction</radical> builds a <kanji>rainbow</kanji>. Did you ever wonder where rainbows come from? Construction insects build them. Construction insects build rainbows.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>rainbow</kanji> building insect is so <reading>needy</reading> (にじ). He is needy because he needs everyone to look at his rainbow and praise him for what he’s done. “Look at my rainbow! Look at how good it is and I am! I’m so needy! Needy for praise and recognition!”
